chunk_text:
INQUIRIES
###### Weddings
### Pavilion & Lawn
20.000 square feet of manicured lawn space with large pavilion, the perfect outdoor space for a sunny reception. Ideal for
• Reception
• Dance Parties
### Chapel
Have your wedding for up to 180 people in our beautiful chapel. Equipped with a lovely primary suite, as well as a private room for the wedding party.

metadata.title: Host Your Wedding at our Vineyard
